solution_line_template: Happy has to take {increase_percentage} * {current_cups_per_week} = <<{increase_percentage}*{current_cups_per_week}={additional_cups}>>{additional_cups} more cups of water than she takes currently to reach the recommended water intake levels by her doctor.

In total, she is supposed to drink {additional_cups}+{current_cups_per_week} = <<{additional_cups}+{current_cups_per_week}={recommended_cups_per_week}>>{recommended_cups_per_week} cups of water every week.
